entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
